Package cz.cuni.mff.desitka.wiki.getters

Class WikiGetter

java.lang.Object
cz.cuni.mff.desitka.wiki.getters.WikiGetter
Direct Known Subclasses:
CategoriesWikiGetter, KeysWikiGetter, ValuesWikiGetter
public abstract class WikiGetter extends Object
This abstract class provides methods for getting information from a wiki. It includes methods for getting child categories, child articles, parent categories, and the main article of a category. It also includes methods for cleaning the starting directory and checking if a category has an article.
